item.description:
Join us Sunday the 9th for a casual game of frisbee in the park! Come socialize , exercise, and enjoy the summer weather all in the same afternoon. Just like Saturday meetup, only sweatier.
So bring your frisbee (your balls too), tell your friends, and we hope to see you Sunday!


Place
Danehy Park, Cambridge MA
Walking Distance From Alewife Station (Redline)
Behind the Fresh Pond Shopping Center Across the Street from Alewife

http://maps.google.co...

In this park there are softball fields, we will be there!

Meeting place
We'll meet near the path in front of the softball fields in Danehy Park.
(the green arrow on the map)

If coming by car...
There is free parking at the back of Danehy Park. Enter from behind the
Whole Foods Market/Fresh Pond Cinema.

Contact info
I will sent you who will respond "Yes" or "Maybe" my mobile phone number.
If you will get lost, please call me.

Weather
If it rains on Sunday, this event will be canceled.
If the weather looks bad that morning, please check your e-mail - I will send you our decision by 10 AM.

Preparation
I will some frisbee/balls, but we can always use more! Please bring any sports equipment you think might be fun to use in a park.

Expect hot weather so please bring plenty to drink, a towel, sunscreen, cap etc.

We usually go for dinner/drinks afterwards so if you are interested, plan accordingly (change of clothes, money etc.).

Looking forward to seeing everyone!
item.name: Sports Meetup
